column5: Hey all.  So I'm looking to get a new smoker (I have 2 for free if anyone wants one, one wood burning one electric/hot plate unit that I made) and I just found this Landmann Smokey Mountain 2-Drawer Propane Smoker in the BPS flyer.  Has anyone ever seen this and or used it?  There is only one review on the site so before I drive an hour or more I figured I would ask here.  I've got $300.00 I'm willing to spend on a new smoker.  Thanks.  link to smoker on BPS site  Geoff
looks pretty sweet and it got a great review
Does anyone have a Smokehouse Little Chief Front Load Smoker?  How is it? Little Chief Front Load Smoker

I used one of these had trouble with the element, the cord would melt off during a long smoke then I would solder it back together. Eventualy we just used a hot plate and turffed the heating unit it was a pain in the ass
That's one off the list, thanks!
That propane unit looks sweet, I'd be looking into that in fact I'm looking into that thankyou
I'm just looking for a decent unit that is under $300.00 after taxes.  As long as it doesn't use the dang pucks!
I use the BIG CHIEF and it works great.

i have the centro unit and been very happy with it. no issues with the display or the element as yet. electronic temperature control makes things easy.  http://reviews.canadiantire.ca/9045/0851447P/reviews.htm
Going to BPS today around lunch to get me a new smoker... Anyone else going to be in the area today around lunch?
